name: Pixel Boy DEMO tiny pink [Canceled]
description:
Canceled

My first game.

Move - Arrow

Jump - A

Play with a little pink girl Tiny Pink.
Due to its size it goes through small arrowheads,
only a smaller crate can push.
I still have to do a lot of things with the game to get better,
new things will come.

V2

Now Tiny Pink can push tiny crates.

Added a door.

Added a moving tutorial sprite.
